author: rdonkin
msg: Added a new page containing information about contributing patches aimed at newbies. We see to get a lot of new contributors in the commons and hopefully this will answer some of their common questions. Most of this information is already available in jakarta but hopefully the links from this document should make it a little more visible.

author: rdonkin
msg: Added descriptions for discovery and daemon to the web site. Added discovery.html (created automatically from existing discovery.xml).

author: martinc
msg: Update the Commons charter, per the recent vote on commons-dev, to clarify
the use of coding conventions in Commons components.

author: martinc
msg: Add FileUpload to the web site.

author: rdonkin
msg: Added new web page on volunteering based on recent post to commons-dev by Craig R. McClanahan
